short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call /@@reload or ?diazo on your current Plone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays the plone.reload form in a popup so you can easily reload your current Plone instance code without switching to another tab.
It also provides buttons to opne diazo off/debug urls.
